name: Lahaul and Spiti
description: Lahaul and Spiti is a district in Himachal Pradesh known for its stark landscapes, ancient monasteries, and unique culture. The district is famous for its high-altitude passes, Buddhist monasteries, and adventure tourism.
summary: A land of ancient monasteries and breathtaking landscapes

locations.name: Keylong
locations.description: District headquarters known for its scenic beauty and cultural heritage.
locations.address: Keylong, Lahaul and Spiti District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Kaza
locations.description: Main town of Spiti Valley, known for its monasteries and scenic beauty.
locations.address: Kaza, Lahaul and Spiti District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Kibber
locations.description: One of the highest inhabited villages in the world, known for its unique culture.
locations.address: Kibber, Lahaul and Spiti District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Tabo Monastery
locations.description: Ancient monastery known as the 'Ajanta of the Himalayas' for its murals.
locations.address: Tabo, Lahaul and Spiti District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Chandratal Lake
locations.description: High-altitude lake known for its crescent shape and stunning beauty.
locations.address: Chandratal, Lahaul and Spiti District, Himachal Pradesh
